item.title: Deploying in Kubernetes. Checklist.
item.description: While kubernetes is easy to start with, it is quite challenging to master and know all details. In this post I will provide checklist of important manifest stanzas that are applicable to most applications that are targeted to run in production and which are expected to not have downtime during cluster maintenance and/or application updates.

item.title: Installing Kubernetes on Raspberry Pi
item.description: Installing kubernetes on Raspberry Pi is easy, but there are few caveats that you need to be aware of. arm64 is preferred, because 64-bit allows you to use > 4GB of RAM per process. Enable cgroups Kubernetes relies on cgroups for enforcing limits for the containers, so kernel needs to be booted with cgroups support.
